code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Courses=()=>{const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));const[courses,setCourses]=useState([{id:1,title:"React Basics",description:"Learn React from scratch"},{id:2,title:"Advanced JavaScript",description:"Deep dive into JS"}]);const handleAddCourse=()=>{const newCourse={id:Date.now(),title:"New Course",description:"Course description"};setCourses([...courses,newCourse]);};const handleDeleteCourse=id=>{setCourses(courses.filter(course=>course.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Courses"}),user&&user.role==="admin"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddCourse,children:"Add Course"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:course.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"View Course"}),user&&(user.role==="admin"||user.role==="instructor")&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Edit Course"}),user&&user.role==="admin"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteCourse(course.id),children:"Delete Course"})]},course.id))})]});};export default Courses;
